topic.title: Opening the ZeroNet port behind a VPN
topic.body: So, I'm using a VPN that allows up to 20 ports to be opened, however each port is assigned to a user. Which means that I can't open the 15441 port. I tried opening it on my router, but that doesn't work because I'm running behind the VPN. Any solution to this?

1_1LfJFYyVgJpcWCHWBDYjbbQeUFMaqYKt7T.body:
> [james007](#comment_18_1DiRWRFXcVgQQ75cXnAG2pyxxjGo2VaH5): Yes, run it with the command line to override port 15441 to one of the open ones. [...]

Thanks, worked without a problem under Linux!
